import React, {useState, useContext} from 'react'; import {AlertContext} from '../../context/alert/alertContext' export const Form = (props) => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name : "", email : "", message : "" }) const alert = useContext(AlertContext) const changeHandler = e => { setForm({...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const submitHandler = () => { if (form.name !== '' && form.email !== '' && form.message !== '') { alert.show('Employeer has been added successfully!', 'success') console.log(form) props.updateData({form}) } else { alert.show('Uncorrect data, please enter the valid data!', 'danger') } setForm({ name : "", email : "", message : "" }) } return ( <>

We'll never share your data with anyone else.
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
